Label:
## Stay the case 

 All parties will be notified.

## Dismiss the case
This case will be dismissed. Parties will be able to view the case details but not take any actions on it.

## Amend and restitch bundle
Make sure you have taken the correct action to amend the bundle before you restitch.  
The restitched bundle will replace the existing bundle.  
All parties will be notified.
